name: Publicly Accessible RDS with no/old TLS
query: { dbInstances (where: { cloudProvider: "aws" AND: [ { publicAccessBlocked: false } { securityGroups_SOME: { rules_SOME: { sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:0.0.0.0/0" } } } { OR: [ {tlsStatus: ""} {tlsStatus: "disabled"} {tlsMinimumVersion: 0} {tlsMinimumVersion: 1} {tlsMinimumVersion: 1.100000023841858} ] } ] }) { identifier accountID cloudAccountID cloudAccountName cloudProvider idFromProvider internalAssetType internalName internalRegion assetCategory } }
